
```py
with pm.Model() as model_neg:Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*Â = pm.Normal("*Î±*", mu=0, sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*Â = pm.Normal("*Î²*", mu=0, sigma=10)Â 
Â Â Â Â ÏƒÂ = pm.HalfNormal("Ïƒ", 10)Â 
Â Â Â Â Î¼Â = pm.Deterministic("Î¼", pm.math.exp(*Î±* + *Î²*Â * bikes.temperature))Â 
Â Â Â Â y_pred = pm.NegativeBinomial("y_pred", mu=Î¼, alpha=Ïƒ, observed=bikes.rented)Â 
Â Â Â Â idata_neg = pm.sample()Â 
Â Â Â Â idata_neg.extend(pm.sample_posterior_predictive(idata_neg))
```

```py
with pm.Model() as model_t:Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*Â = pm.Normal("*Î±*", mu=ans.y.mean(), sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*Â = pm.Normal("*Î²*", mu=0, sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â ÏƒÂ = pm.HalfNormal("Ïƒ", 5)Â 
Â Â Â Â Î½_ = pm.Exponential("Î½_", 1 / 29)Â 
Â Â Â Â Î½Â = pm.Deterministic("Î½", Î½_ + 1)Â 
Â Â Â Â Î¼Â = pm.Deterministic("Î¼", *Î±*Â + *Î²*Â * ans.x)Â 
Â Â Â Â _ = pm.StudentT("y_pred", mu=Î¼, sigma=Ïƒ, nu=Î½, observed=ans.y)Â 
Â Â Â Â idata_t = pm.sample(2000)
```

```py
df = iris.query("species == ('setosa', 'versicolor')")Â 
y_0 = pd.Categorical(df["species"]).codesÂ 
x_n = "sepal_length"Â 
x_0 = df[x_n].valuesÂ 
x_c = x_0 - x_0.mean()
```

```py
with pm.Model() as model_lrs:Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*Â = pm.Normal("*Î±*", mu=0, sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*Â = pm.Normal("*Î²*", mu=0, sigma=5)Â 
Â Â Â Â Î¼Â = *Î±*Â + x_c * *Î²*Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î¸*Â = pm.Deterministic("*Î¸*", pm.math.sigmoid(Î¼))Â 
Â Â Â Â bd = pm.Deterministic("bd", -*Î±* / *Î²*)Â 
Â Â Â Â yl = pm.Bernoulli("yl", p=*Î¸*, observed=y_0)Â 

Â Â Â Â idata_lrs = pm.sample()
```

```py
with pm.Model() as model_vv:Â 
Â Â Â Â x_shared = pm.MutableData("x_shared", data.month.values.astype(float))Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*Â = pm.Normal("*Î±*", sigma=10)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*Â = pm.Normal("*Î²*", sigma=10)Â 
Â Â Â Â Î³Â = pm.HalfNormal("Î³", sigma=10)Â 
Â Â Â Â Î´Â = pm.HalfNormal("Î´", sigma=10)Â 

Â Â Â Â Î¼Â = pm.Deterministic("Î¼", ğ›¼Â + *Î²*Â * x_shared**0.5)Â 
Â Â Â Â ÏƒÂ = pm.Deterministic("Ïƒ", Î³Â + Î´Â * x_shared)Â 

Â Â Â Â y_pred = pm.Normal("y_pred", mu=Î¼, sigma=Ïƒ, observed=data.length)Â 

Â Â Â Â idata_vv = pm.sample()
```

```py
with model_vv:Â 
Â Â Â Â pm.set_data({"x_shared": [0.5]})Â 
Â Â Â Â ppc = pm.sample_posterior_predictive(idata_vv)Â 
Â Â Â Â y_ppc = ppc.posterior_predictive["y_pred"].stack(sample=("chain", "draw"))
```

```py
coords = {"group": ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "G", "H"]}Â 

with pm.Model(coords=coords) as unpooled_model:Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*Â = pm.Normal("*Î±*", mu=0, sigma=10, dims="group")Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*Â = pm.Normal("*Î²*", mu=0, sigma=10, dims="group")Â 
Â Â Â Â ÏƒÂ = pm.HalfNormal("Ïƒ", 5)Â 
Â Â Â Â _ = pm.Normal("y_pred", mu=*Î±*[idx] + *Î²*[idx] * x_m, sigma=Ïƒ, observed=y_m)Â 

Â Â Â Â idata_up = pm.sample()
```

```py
with pm.Model(coords=coords) as hierarchical_centered:Â 
Â Â Â Â # hyperpriorsÂ 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*_Î¼ = pm.Normal("*Î±*_Î¼", mu=y_m.mean(), sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*_Ïƒ = pm.HalfNormal("*Î±*_Ïƒ", 5)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*_Î¼ = pm.Normal("*Î²*_Î¼", mu=0, sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*_Ïƒ = pm.HalfNormal("*Î²*_Ïƒ", sigma=5)Â 

Â Â Â Â # priorsÂ 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*Â = pm.Normal("*Î±*", mu=*Î±*_Î¼, sigma=*Î±*_Ïƒ, dims="group")Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*Â = pm.Normal("*Î²*", mu=*Î²*_Î¼, sigma=*Î²*_Ïƒ, dims="group")Â 
Â Â Â Â ÏƒÂ = pm.HalfNormal("Ïƒ", 5)Â 
Â Â Â Â _ = pm.Normal("y_pred", mu=*Î±*[idx] + *Î²*[idx] * x_m, sigma=Ïƒ, observed=y_m)Â 

Â Â Â Â idata_cen = pm.sample()
```

```py
with pm.Model(coords=coords) as hierarchical_non_centered:Â 
Â Â Â Â # hyperpriorsÂ 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*_Î¼ = pm.Normal("*Î±*_Î¼", mu=y_m.mean(), sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*_Ïƒ = pm.HalfNormal("*Î±*_Ïƒ", 5)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*_Î¼ = pm.Normal("*Î²*_Î¼", mu=0, sigma=1)Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*_Ïƒ = pm.HalfNormal("*Î²*_Ïƒ", sigma=5)Â 

Â Â Â Â # priorsÂ 
Â Â Â Â *Î±*Â = pm.Normal("*Î±*", mu=*Î±*_Î¼, sigma=*Î±*_Ïƒ, dims="group")Â 

Â Â Â Â *Î²*_offset = pm.Normal("*Î²*_offset", mu=0, sigma=1, dims="group")Â 
Â Â Â Â *Î²*Â = pm.Deterministic("*Î²*", *Î²*_Î¼ + *Î²*_offset * *Î²*_Ïƒ, dims="group")Â 

Â Â Â Â ÏƒÂ = pm.HalfNormal("Ïƒ", 5)Â 
Â Â Â Â _ = pm.Normal("y_pred", mu=*Î±*[idx] + *Î²*[idx] * x_m, sigma=Ïƒ, observed=y_m)Â 

Â Â Â Â idata_ncen = pm.sample(target_accept=0.85)
```
